bibl.title: O zapustenii zemel' v Fajume v IV-V vv. n.e. Avec résumé en anglais: Land Degradation in Fayûm in the 4th-5th Centuries A.D.
bibl.note: The papyri from Theadelphia show that both the environment and its inhabitants fell victim to irrational economic and social policies of the imperial authorities.
bibl.seg: PAVLOVSKAYA A.I., O zapustenii zemel' v Fajume v IV-V vv. n.e. Avec résumé en anglais: Land Degradation in Fayûm in the 4th-5th Centuries A.D.
The papyri from Theadelphia show that both the environment and its inhabitants fell victim to irrational economic and social policies of the imperial authorities.
